tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE BatteryUsage (
    drone_id INT,
    battery_level DECIMAL,
    charging_cycles INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (drone_id, timestamp)
)

CREATE TABLE BatteryUsage (
    drone_id INT,
    usage_date DATE,
    battery_level DECIMAL,
    charging_cycle_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (drone_id, usage_date)
);

CREATE TABLE ChargingCycles (
    charging_cycle_id INT,
    start_date TIMESTAMP,
    end_date TIMESTAMP,
    total_charging_time FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (charging_cycle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DroneChargingHistory (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id INT,
    station_id INT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    energy_transferred DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE charging_sessions (
    session_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id UUID,
    station_id UUID,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
);
